alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pike; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Spalding, northeastern Pike and northern Lamar Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Zetella to Meansville, and moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Barnesville, Zebulon, Milner, Williamson, Orchard Hill, Meansville, Aldora, East Griffin, Rover and Zetella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
